name: MLB The Show 23
description:
MLB® The Show™ 23 gets you closer than ever to living your baseball dreams on the diamond. Shock the game and Own The Show™ with your favorite players, your favorite rivalries and all your favorite MLB® moments.

Get the next-generation MLB The Show experience when you play on PlayStation® 5 consoles, including the return of Stadium Creator mode, and face your friends with cross-platform play.2 With cross progression, continue your progress and earn and use content on other console platforms.3
